name: Japanese Stainless Steel Kitchen Knife
description: High-quality surplus kitchen knife from Japan. Sharp, durable, and perfect for home cooking. Single bevel design.

name: Vintage Japan Tool Set (6pc)
description: Surplus tool set from Japan. Includes screwdrivers, pliers, and wrenches. Great for DIY and repairs.

name: Japanese Ceramic Rice Bowl Set
description: Set of 4 ceramic rice bowls. Traditional design, microwave safe. Perfect for daily meals.

name: Surplus LED Work Light
description: Portable LED work light from Japan surplus. Adjustable stand, long battery life. Ideal for garage or workshop.

name: Japan Import Insulated Lunch Box
description: Stainless steel insulated bento box. Keeps food warm or cold for hours. Leak-proof and easy to clean.

name: Vintage Japanese Cast Iron Teapot
description: Small tetsubin-style cast iron teapot. Enhances tea flavor and retains heat. Great for green tea.
